description.full: BradyGames brings you the ultimate strategy videos for the Ultimate Alliance Expansion Pack. Learn how to use all of the new characters' Abilities, unlock their alternate costumes, tap into secret Team Bonuses and much more.
description.short: BradyGames brings you the ultimate strategy videos for the Ultimate Alliance Expansion Pack. Learn how to use all of the new characters' Abilities, unlock their alternate costumes, tap into secret Team Bonuses and much more.
